rightsList.rights:
The data included in this download are provided to the user under a Creative Commons BY-NC 4.0 license which means that you are free to use, share, and adapt the data provided that you give reasonable and appropriate credit (attribution) and that you do not use the material for commercial purposes (non-commercial).+
Data from some individual datasets included in this download may be licensed under less restrictive terms; review the details below.

descriptions.description: A dataset containing 7835 species occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: TaxonKey: Puma concolor (Linnaeus, 1771). The dataset includes 7835 records from the following 113 constituent datasets: 3 records from Western Australian Museum provider for OZCAM. 269 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data. 24 records from Colección nacional de zoología. 2 records from Registros biológicos de especies de fauna vertebrada terrestre en las centrales de San Carlos y Jaguas - 2009. 3 records from CNMA/Colección de Mamíferos de la Estación de Biología Chamela. 27 records from Paleobiology Database. 119 records from iNaturalist research-grade observations. 49 records from Macaulay Library Audio and Video Collection. 2 records from Mamíferos laguna El Tinije. 57 records from TTU Mammals Collection. 3 records from Mammal collection of National Museum of Nature and Science. 6 records from UWYMV Mammal Collection (Arctos). 149 records from New Mexico Biodiversity Collections Consortium database. 42 records from SBMNH Vertebrate Zoology. 2 records from Mammal collection, Natural History Museum, University of Oslo. 4 records from University of Ghent - Zoology Museum - Vertebratacollectie. 27 records from NYSM Mammals. 12 records from Mammal specimens. 1 records from condoncollection. 904 records from MSB Mammal Collection (Arctos). 1 records from The Mammalia Collection at the Staatssammlung für Anthropologie und Paläoanatomie München. 7 records from Mammals Specimens. 102 records from UCMP Vertebrate Collection. 96 records from UCM Mammals Collection. 347 records from AMNH Mammal Collections. 2 records from naturgucker. 1745 records from VERTEBRADOS DE VALOR ESPECIAL EN ÁREAS PROTEGIDAS DE LA ARGENTINA. 2 records from Mammal specimen database of Kanagawa Prefectural Museum of Natural History. 453 records from Avistajes de espcies de valor especial en áreas protegidas del noreste de Argentina. 54 records from CAS Mammalogy (MAM). 19 records from Collection Mammalia SMF. 55 records from Mammals collection (ZM) of the Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle (MNHN - Paris). 108 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Mammal Collection. 3 records from Mammal tissues, Division of Genomic Resources, UNM, Albuquerque, NM.. 1 records from Bird tissues, Division of Genomic Resources, UNM, Albuquerque, NM.. 1 records from Anfibios, reptiles y mamíferos del corredor biológico del norte de Yucatán depositados en las colecciones de la Escuela Nacional de Ciencias Biológicas. 30 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Mammalia. 7 records from UAM Mammal Collection (Arctos). 3 records from Computarización de la Colección Nacional de mamíferos del Instituto de Biología, UNAM. 17 records from UNSM Vertebrate Specimens. 6 records from Universidad Industrial de Santander, Museo de Historia Natural, Colección de Mastozoología. 330 records from Registros biológicos en áreas protegidas obtenidos de documentos impresos. 8 records from Palaeobiology - Vertebrate Comparative Osteology Collection - Royal Ontario Museum. 13 records from CNMA/Colección Nacional de mamíferos. 56 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection. 12 records from Vertebrates of the Gothenburg Natural History Museum (GNM). 4 records from Colección científica del Museo de Historia Natural Alfredo Dugés. 36 records from Mammalogy Collection - Royal Ontario Museum. 28 records from Bird and Mammal specimens. 1 records from (UTC) University of Tennessee Mammals Collection. 25 records from HSU Wildlife Mammals. 3 records from NMMNH Mammal. 14 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Mammalogy, Yale Peabody Museum. 49 records from Cowan Tetrapod Collection - Mammals. 1 records from Distribución geográfica de las aves y los mamíferos de las zonas montanas de los estados de San Luis Potosí e Hidalgo circundantes de la Sierra Gorda. 13 records from Mammals housed at MHNG, Geneva. 2 records from Natural History Museum Rotterdam (NL) - Chordata collection. 1 records from Lund Museum of Zoology (MZLU). 9 records from CCBER Mammalogy Collection. 7 records from South Australian Museum Australia provider for OZCAM. 28 records from RBINS collections. 202 records from Plan de vertebrados de la Patagonia. 12 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences. 53 records from PSM Vertebrates Collection. 3 records from Ibaraki Nature Museum, Mammals collection. 2 records from Borror Lab of Bioacoustics (BLB), Ohio State University. 75 records from UTEP Vertebrates. 16 records from LSUMZ Mammals Collection. 18 records from Sistematización de las colecciones científicas del Instituto de Historia Natural y Ecología, (IHNE) Chiapas. 9 records from NCSM Mammals Collection. 9 records from Australian Museum provider for OZCAM. 1 records from MfN - Fossil vertebrates IV. 3 records from Deforestación y fragmentación del hábitat: consecuencias ecológicas sobre la fauna de mamíferos de la selva tropical estacional. 3 records from Rango, comportamiento, tamaño de población y conservación de felinos en el Volcán de Colima. 54 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University. 16 records from Rapid Assessment Program (RAP) Biodiversity Survey Database. 8 records from MLZ Mammal Collection (Arctos). 1 records from Registros biológicos de especies de fauna vertebrada terrestre en las centrales de San Carlos y Jaguas - 2007. 58 records from Mamíferos de la colección del Instituto Alexander von Humboldt. 32 records from Actualización y enriquecimiento de las bases de datos del proyecto de evaluación y análisis geográfico de la diversidad faunística de Chiapas. 16 records from UMZC Zoological Specimens. 6 records from Vertebrados terrestres del Corredor Biológico Sierra Madre del Sur, Chiapas, México. 1 records from Colección de Mamíferos del Centro Nacional Patagónico. 19 records from CRCM Vertebrate Collection. 1 records from Zoology (Museum of Evolution - Uppsala). 2 records from WNMU Mammal Collection (Arctos). 23 records from Inventario de fauna presente en la jurisdicción de Corantioquia. 25 records from Database Schema for UC Davis Wildlife museum. 13 records from Biodiversity Research and Teaching Collections - TCWC Vertebrates. 52 records from MSU Mammalogy, Ornithology and Vertebrate Paleontology Collections. 2 records from Colección de Mamíferos del Museo de Zoología 'Alfonso L . Herrera', México (MZFC, UNAM). 6 records from Mammal specimens. 24 records from University of Alberta Museums, Mammalogy Collection. 5 records from Museu de Ciències Naturals de Barcelona: MCNB-Cord. 12 records from Fundación Miguel Lillo - Colección Mamíferos. 3 records from Inventario de la mastofauna en las reservas de la biosfera Desierto del Vizcaíno y Valle de los Cirios. 59 records from UWBM Mammalogy Collection. 192 records from MVZ Mammal Collection (Arctos). 116 records from DMNS Mammal Collection (Arctos). 2 records from Inventario de los mamíferos de las reservas de la biósfera Mapimí, La Michilía, El Cielo y Calakmul. 21 records from UMMZ Mammal Collection. 1 records from ISU Mammals. 1 records from Análisis ecológico de la mastofauna en la parte alta del Rio Güangui. 4 records from CUMV Mammal Collection (Arctos). 107 records from Animal Sound Archive. 37 records from Colección de Mastozoología. 177 records from Colección Nacional de Mastozoología - Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales 'Bernardino Rivadavia'. 819 records from NMNH occurrence DwC-A. 2 records from IIAPPoa. 28 records from Zoological Museum Amsterdam, University of Amsterdam (NL) – Mammalia. 78 records from KUBI Mammalogy Collection. 1 records from Naturhistorisches Museum Mainz, Zoological Collection. 1 records from Colección de moldes endocraneanos del CENPAT.
